meta.article_title: November 6, 2023 - Three Keys to Fast Reacting

debutant.Ready position: Recover quickly from the previous shot, stay balanced, weight on front inside part of your foot, feet at least shoulder width apart, with racket pointing right at the expected contact point of the opponent. Never wait to see if you have to move - expect to move.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice moving your feet reflexively, stay balanced and focus on balance.

erreurs_a_eviter.Don't guess: Take your time and make sure your first move is the right move
